meanings.sent1: The eluates from the experiment were carefully analyzed.
meanings.sent2: Scientists studied the eluates to understand their composition.
meanings.sent3: The eluates decided to throw a party to celebrate being separated.
meanings.sent4: The eluates flowed out of the column like a sparkling stream.
meanings.sent5: The colorful eluates glowed under the microscope, revealing their secrets.

meanings.definition: Eluates: the result of eluting a substance.
meanings.sent1: The eluates collected at the bottom of the test tube.
meanings.sent2: The technician carefully labeled each vial of eluates.
meanings.sent3: The eluates giggled as they were poured out of the container.
meanings.sent4: The eluates resembled tiny jewels in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The sweet scent of the eluates filled the laboratory, signaling success.

meanings.definition: Eluates: to separate or extract a substance by elution.
meanings.sent1: She eluates the compounds to isolate the desired chemical.
meanings.sent2: The machine efficiently eluates the target molecules.
meanings.sent3: The chef eluates the flavors from the ingredients to create a delicious sauce.
meanings.sent4: His words eluates the truth from the tangled web of lies.
meanings.sent5: The magician eluates the hidden card from the deck with a flick of his wrist.
